overview: More than 15 years in Software Engineering primarily in the telecommunications industry, Martin has been a contributor and leader of development projects ranging from telecom conformance testing software, to new telecom protocol layers, to DSL multiplexer software on silicon. Lenny’s experience spans companies from startups to corporate giants including the likes of Solinet Gmbh (Germany), Trillium, Intel and Peoplesoft.One it’s first employees, Martin has been a key contributor to the success of the company and the development of the product. Martin has a Masters in Electrical/Electronic Engineering from Leeds University, England.
